mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO bicycle_info (id, model, frame_no, image, produce_time, qrcode, qr_img, conclusion, remark, is_del, create_time, update_time) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.model}, #{item.frameNo}, #{item.image}, #{item.produceTime}, #{item.qrcode},#{item.qrImg},#{item.conclusion},#{item.remark},#{item.isDel},#{item.createTime},#{item.updateTime})
